serviceDescription:
Welcome to the future of home energy in Somers, Connecticut. Our professional solar battery storage installation service helps Somers homeowners achieve true energy independence while protecting against power outages and rising electricity costs. With over 12 years of experience serving Tolland County, we've helped hundreds of families store their solar energy and use it exactly when needed - during expensive evening hours, during grid outages, or whenever they choose.

Somers residents understand the value of self-reliance, and solar battery storage delivers exactly that. Instead of sending your excess solar production back to the grid for minimal credit, capture that energy in a premium battery system like Tesla Powerwall. Your stored solar power becomes your personal energy reserve, available 24/7 regardless of grid conditions. Whether storms knock out power across Somers or you simply want to avoid peak electricity rates, your battery storage system gives you complete control.

Our Somers battery storage installations include comprehensive energy assessments, custom system design tailored to your home's specific needs, professional installation by NABCEP-certified technicians, and seamless integration with existing solar panels or new solar arrays. We work with all leading battery brands - Tesla Powerwall, LG Chem RESU, Enphase IQ Battery, and Generac PWRcell - ensuring the perfect energy storage solution for your Somers property. Every installation includes intelligent energy management, smartphone monitoring, and automatic backup switching.

Financial benefits make battery storage remarkably affordable for Somers homeowners. The Federal Solar Investment financing applies to battery systems when paired with solar panels, potentially saving $3,000-$7,000. Connecticut offers additional flexible financing, and Eversource provides utility-level programs. We handle all permitting with Somers building department, utility interconnection paperwork, and incentive applications. Join your Somers neighbors in achieving energy independence with professional battery storage installation.
